    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>

            <catalog>CFL</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Trigonometriska kurvor av typen y = A·sin(kx + v) + b</string>
            <string language="en">Trigonometriska curves of the type y=A·itself (kx+v)+b</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Trigonometriska Kurven des Typen y=A&middot;selbst (kx+v)+b</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Courbes de Trigonometriska du type y=A&middot;soi-même (kx+v)+b</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Curvas de Trigonometriska do tipo y=A&middot;próprio (kx+v)+b</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Curve di Trigonometriska del tipo y=A&middot;in se (kx+v)+b</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καμπύλες Trigonometriska του τύπου y=A&middot;ο ίδιος (kx+v)+b</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Curvas de Trigonometriska del tipo y=A&middot;sí mismo (kx+v)+b</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Vi ska nu studera hur värdena på A, k, v och b i en trigonometrisk funktion på formen y = A sin(kx + v) + b påverkar utseendet på grafen. Modul 3 - Numeriska metoder.Matematik D - Åsö.</string>
            <string language="en">We will now study how the values on A, k, v and b in one trigonometrisk function on the mould y=A itself (kx+v)+b influences the appearance on the graph. 

Module 3 - numeric methods.

Mathematics D - Åsö.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Matematik D</string>
            <string language="sv">matematik</string>
            <string language="sv">trigonometri</string>
            <string language="sv">formler</string>
            <string language="sv">trigonometrisk funktion</string>
            <string language="sv">graf</string>
            <string language="sv">amplitud</string>
            <string language="en">Mathematics D</string>
            <string language="en">mathematics</string>
            <string language="en">trigonometri</string>
            <string language="en">formulas</string>
            <string language="en">trigonometrisk function</string>
            <string language="en">graph</string>
            <string language="en">amplitude</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wir studieren jetzt wie die Werte auf A, k, v und
b in einer trigonometrisk Funktion auf dem Form y=A selbst (kx+v)+b 
beeinflussen das Aussehen auf dem Diagramm. Modul 3 - 
numerisches methods.Mathematics D - Åsö.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Nous étudierons maintenant comment les valeurs 
sur A, k, v et b dans une fonction de trigonometrisk sur le y=A de 
moule lui-même (kx+v)+b influencent l'aspect sur le graphique. 
Module 3 - methods.Mathematics numérique D - Åsö.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nós estudaremos agora como os valores em A, em 
k, em v e em b em uma função do trigonometrisk no y=A do molde 
próprio (kx+v)+b influenciam a aparência no gráfico. Módulo 
3 - methods.Mathematics numérico D - Åsö.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ora studeremo come i valori su A, su K, sulla v e
sulla b in una funzione del trigonometrisk sul y=A della muffa in se 
(kx+v)+b influenzano l'apparenza sul grafico. Modulo 3 - 
methods.Mathematics numerico D - Åsö.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θα μελετήσουμε τώρα πώς οι τιμές στο Α, το Κ, το β και
το β σε μια λειτουργία trigonometrisk στη φόρμα y=A το ίδιο 
(επιρροές kx+v)+b η εμφάνιση στη γραφική παράσταση. 
Ενότητα 3 - αριθμητικά μαθηματικά δ μεθόδων - Εsφ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ahora estudiaremos cómo los valores en A, k, v y
b en una función del trigonometrisk en el y=A del molde sí mismo 
(kx+v)+b influencian el aspecto en el gráfico. Módulo 3 - 
methods.Mathematics numérico D - Åsö.</string>
          </description>
